content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. It's a fantastic property in the heart of the city, and I'm sure you'll appreciate its location and modern amenities. How much are you willing to pay for such a prime piece of real estate?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to rent the apartment for 600 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's far below my expectations. This is a luxurious apartment in the city center, and I believe it's worth much more. Can you offer a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I increase my offer to 700 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While 700 Euro is better, it's still not reflecting the true value of this apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the quality and location. Are you willing to negotiate further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I am willing to negotiate further. I increase my offer to 800 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your continued interest, Mr. Abbasi. 800 Euro is closer to what I had in mind. However, I still believe this apartment deserves a higher price. Would you be willing to go up to 900 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I increase my offer to 850 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While I appreciate your effort, 850 Euro is still not the price I'm looking for. This apartment is in high demand, and I'm confident that someone will be willing to pay its fair market value. Would you reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I increase my offer to 900 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent! 900 Euro per month is much closer to what I had in mind. I'm glad to see that you're serious about this apartment. Would you be willing to pay a deposit equivalent to one month's rent to secure the property?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
